Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 to us, reflecting its quality, uniqueness, and the time invested in its creation. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $14000. Should you decide to accept this offer, you will be acquiring not just a product, but a valuable asset that promises to serve you well for years to come. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable item into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
